comments.html: your letter has opened my eyes thatI I have to be ready to learn new things and if necessary old ones too

That's so right! After my first contact with VueJs, it seemed a little bit tough to grasp.
Then I was worrying: how can it be hard for me while everybody claims it's easy?
Now with time learning here and there and dealing with other frameworks (I learned AlpineJS and actually used it to build a SPA in one day), the most important skill I want to develop is getting better at learning aka metalearning, learning fast.
